sentences.english: The damaging effects of alcohol on testosterone are made even worse when you exercise before drinking.

sentences.english: He often indulges himself in drinking.

sentences.chinese: 遙望張飛大明燈燭，正在帳中飲酒。

sentences.english: But the truth is there was no drunken carousing more honorable and fruitful.
sentences.chinese: 但是實際上，飲酒作樂實在是人生的一大快事。

sentences.english: Professor Heather said the belief that small amounts of alcohol are good for health was much stronger in the past than it is today.
sentences.chinese: 希瑟教授說，現在每天少量飲酒的好處比過去更多。

sentences.english: Moderate drinkers also lived longer than non-drinkers.
sentences.chinese: 適度飲酒的人比不喝酒的人壽命更長。

sentences.english: There you drink while listening to my singing.
Below 45 years of age, chronic atrophic gastritis was seen only in alcoholics.

sentences.english: Avoid over-indulgence in drinking and smoking on weekday nights.
sentences.chinese: 平日裏晚上要避免過度飲酒和吸菸。

sentences.english: However, drinking alcohol widens your blood vessels, causing your body to swell.
sentences.chinese: 然而，飲酒會使血管擴張，從而引起身體腫脹。

sentences.english: Woe unto them that are mighty to drink wine, and men of strength to mingle strong drink
sentences.chinese: 禍哉，那些勇於飲酒，以能力調濃酒的人。

sentences.english: Some individuals drink to cope with or "medicate" emotional problems.
sentences.chinese: 有些人飲酒是爲了應付或“醫治”感情問題。

sentences.english: Prince daily and ZhangLiHua flirting, bender.

definition: to have tea and refreshments/to have dimsum lunch (Cantonese)
